bike.description: S-Works design, heat-treated Cr-Mo, double-butted, relieved, manipulated, CNC machined and TIG welded, dual lower brake cable routing with amplifier

components.description: Double-butted, manipulated and heat-treated 38mm O.D. Cr-Mo
Double-butted, manipulated and heat-treated 38mm O.D. Cr-Mo
Internally and externally relieved with integrated rotor stops, heat-treated 42mm x 100mm Cr-Mo
Double-butted and heat-treated 33.3mm O.D. Cr-Mo (for 30.9mm seat post)
Euro, 42mm x 68mm, internally and externally relieved heat-treated Cr-Mo
Manipulated tube mono stay 38mm O.D. heat-treated Cr-Mo
Forged alloy and CNC machined single bolt design 33.3x31.3mm
Specialized Fuse, 6061-T6, 6mm allen bolts, 30.9mm/300mm for 9mm rails
Dual lower brake cable routing kit with amplifier
